message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think it's worth discussing a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to start with a price of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $130.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a serious offer, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to meet you at $115, which is a bit closer to your target, but still a good deal for me.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $107.50. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll offer you the product for $112.50, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $110, which is just $2.50 more than my previous offer. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $112. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer you the product for $112. I hope this is a price you're comfortable with.
